metadata.title: Frontend Development
metadata.dependencies: Phase 2 conversation engine must be operational

task.instructions:
You are implementing Phase 3 of the OKR AI Agent project. Your role combines frontend development expertise with UX design specialization. This phase creates the user interface that makes the sophisticated conversation engine accessible and engaging for users creating OKRs.
CRITICAL SUCCESS CRITERIA: - Complete React application with shadcn/ui components and professional design - Real-time chat interface with typing indicators and smooth conversation flow - Live OKR display panel showing draft evolution and quality scores - Export functionality generating professional OKR outputs - Responsive design working flawlessly on desktop and tablet devices - Accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA) for inclusive user experience

context.phase_2_outcomes: Conversation engine completed successfully: - 4-phase conversation flow (Discovery → Refinement → KR Discovery → Validation) - Quality scoring engine with 5-dimension evaluation - Anti-pattern detection with intelligent reframing - Context-aware responses adapting to user patterns - WebSocket integration ready for real-time UI updates - All backend APIs functional and tested
context.user_experience_requirements:
TARGET USER EXPERIENCE: - Professional, modern interface that feels trustworthy for business use - Conversational flow that feels natural, not like a form or checklist - Real-time feedback showing OKR quality improvement throughout conversation - Clear visual progress indication through conversation phases - Immediate export capability for completed OKRs ready for team sharing - Responsive design supporting both focused desktop work and collaborative tablet sessions
DESIGN PRINCIPLES: 1. **Conversation First**: Chat interface is primary, other elements support the dialogue 2. **Progressive Disclosure**: Show information when relevant, avoid overwhelming 3. **Visual Quality Feedback**: Real-time scores help users understand improvement 4. **Professional Polish**: Business users expect high-quality, professional interfaces 5. **Accessibility**: Inclusive design supporting users with diverse needs
context.technical_foundation: From Phase 2, the following backend systems are ready: - WebSocket events: join-session, send-message, receive-message, typing, session-update - REST APIs: session management, OKR retrieval, export generation - Real-time quality scoring updates - Session state management with conversation context - Error handling and recovery mechanisms

deliverable.title: React Application Architecture
deliverable.description: Modern React 18 application with TypeScript and professional development setup
deliverable.technical_requirements: - Vite build system with hot reload and fast development - TypeScript strict mode with comprehensive type definitions - shadcn/ui component library for consistent, professional design - Tailwind CSS for responsive styling and design system - Zustand for predictable state management - React Router for navigation (if multi-page needed) - Error boundaries for graceful error handling
deliverable.architecture_structure: client/src/ ├── components/ │ ├── ui/ # shadcn/ui base components │ ├── chat/ # Conversation interface components │ ├── okr/ # OKR display and management │ ├── layout/ # Application layout components │ └── export/ # Export functionality ├── hooks/ # Custom React hooks ├── store/ # Zustand state management ├── lib/ # Utilities and API client ├── types/ # TypeScript type definitions └── styles/ # Global styles and themes
deliverable.acceptance_criteria: - Application builds and runs without errors - TypeScript compilation in strict mode successful - All components follow established patterns and conventions - Professional design system implemented consistently - Responsive layout works on desktop (1024px+) and tablet (768px+) - Dark/light theme support functional

deliverable.title: Real-time Chat Interface
deliverable.description: Sophisticated conversation interface supporting natural dialogue flow

chat_components.message_list: - Scrollable conversation history with proper message styling - User messages (right-aligned, primary color) - Assistant messages (left-aligned, secondary color) with avatar - Markdown support for rich text formatting in AI responses - Message metadata (timestamps, quality scores, suggestions) - Smooth animations for message appearance - Auto-scroll to bottom with manual scroll override
chat_components.message_input: - Multi-line textarea with auto-resize (up to 150px height) - Send button with loading state and keyboard shortcuts - Character count indicator (soft limit at 1000 characters) - Disabled state during AI response processing - Input validation and sanitization - Placeholder text that updates based on conversation phase
chat_components.conversation_controls: - Typing indicator showing when AI is responding - Phase progress indicator (Discovery → Refinement → KR Discovery → Validation) - Session restart/reset functionality with confirmation - Connection status indicator for WebSocket health - Export trigger when OKRs are ready

deliverable.real_time_features: - WebSocket integration for instant message delivery - Typing indicators with realistic timing - Optimistic updates with rollback on failure - Connection recovery with automatic reconnection - Message queue for offline support - Real-time quality score updates
deliverable.acceptance_criteria: - Smooth conversation flow with <200ms message delivery - WebSocket connection maintained reliably - Typing indicators appear/disappear appropriately - Messages display with proper formatting and styling - Input validation prevents malformed submissions - Error states handled gracefully with user feedback

deliverable.title: OKR Display Panel
deliverable.description: Live preview panel showing OKR evolution and quality assessment

okr_visualization.objective_display: - Current objective draft with evolution history - Quality score with dimensional breakdown (Outcome, Inspiration, Clarity, Alignment, Ambition) - Score progression chart showing improvement over time - Specific feedback and improvement suggestions - Draft history with ability to revert to previous versions
okr_visualization.key_results_list: - Up to 5 key results with individual quality scores - Quantification validation indicators (baseline, target, measurement method) - Outcome vs activity classification with visual indicators - Individual feedback for each key result - Drag-and-drop reordering when multiple KRs exist
okr_visualization.overall_assessment: - Combined quality score with visual progress indicator - Readiness indicator for export (>75 score threshold) - Balance assessment (leading vs lagging indicators) - Completeness checklist (objective + 3-5 KRs)

deliverable.interactive_features: - Click to edit individual OKR components - Quality score drill-down showing specific improvement areas - Historical versions accessible through timeline interface - Copy individual OKRs to clipboard - Preview of export formats before generation
deliverable.acceptance_criteria: - Real-time updates as conversation progresses - Quality scores display accurately with clear visual indicators - All OKR components editable with immediate feedback - Export readiness clearly communicated to users - Responsive design maintains usability on tablet screens

deliverable.title: Export System Frontend
deliverable.description: Professional OKR export functionality with multiple format support

export_formats.json_export: - Complete OKR data with metadata - Quality scores and improvement history - Conversation context and decisions made - Timestamp and session information
export_formats.markdown_export: - Clean, readable OKR presentation - Professional formatting for team sharing - Quality scores and confidence indicators - Next steps and implementation guidance
export_formats.pdf_export: - Professional business document formatting - Company branding placeholder areas - Quality assessment summary - Print-ready layout with proper typography
export_formats.plain_text: - Simple format for easy copying - Email-friendly formatting - Structured for quick reference

deliverable.export_interface: - Export modal with format selection - Preview capability before download - Batch export for multiple sessions - Share functionality (copy link, email) - Export history and re-download capability
deliverable.acceptance_criteria: - All export formats generate correctly and consistently - Export process completes in <3 seconds for typical OKRs - Generated files are professional quality and properly formatted - Export modal is intuitive with clear format explanations - Error handling for export failures with retry capability

deliverable.title: Responsive Design & Accessibility
deliverable.description: Inclusive design supporting diverse users and devices

responsive_breakpoints.desktop: 1024px+ - Full two-panel layout with chat and OKR panel side-by-side
responsive_breakpoints.tablet: 768px-1023px - Adaptive layout with collapsible OKR panel
responsive_breakpoints.mobile: 320px-767px - Single column with tab-based navigation (future consideration)

accessibility_compliance.wcag_aa_requirements: - Color contrast ratios ≥4.5:1 for normal text, ≥3:1 for large text - All interactive elements keyboard accessible - Screen reader support with semantic HTML and ARIA labels - Focus management for modal dialogs and complex interactions - Alternative text for all informational graphics and icons
accessibility_compliance.usability_features: - High contrast mode support - Reduced motion preferences respected - Font size scaling support up to 200% - Clear focus indicators for keyboard navigation - Error messages associated with form controls

deliverable.performance_optimization: - Code splitting for faster initial load - Lazy loading for non-critical components - Image optimization and proper sizing - Bundle size optimization (<500KB initial load) - Core Web Vitals optimization (LCP <2.5s, FID <100ms, CLS <0.1)
deliverable.acceptance_criteria: - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified with automated and manual testing - Responsive design works flawlessly across target device sizes - Performance budgets met with bundle analysis verification - Keyboard navigation supports all functionality - Screen reader testing confirms accessible experience

deliverable.title: Advanced UI Features
deliverable.description: Enhanced user experience features for improved engagement

enhanced_features.theme_system: - Light and dark theme support - System preference detection and respect - Smooth theme transitions without layout shift - Theme persistence across sessions
enhanced_features.animation_system: - Subtle micro-interactions for engagement - Message appearance animations - Quality score progression animations - Loading states with skeleton screens - Respect for reduced motion preferences
enhanced_features.user_preferences: - Interface density options (compact, comfortable, spacious) - Notification preferences for different events - Export format defaults - Conversation pacing preferences

deliverable.acceptance_criteria: - Theme switching works without visual glitches - Animations enhance rather than distract from core functionality - User preferences persist across browser sessions - All animations respect accessibility preferences

step.title: React Application Setup and Architecture
step.actions: - Initialize React application with Vite and TypeScript - Install and configure shadcn/ui component library - Set up Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens - Configure Zustand store for state management - Create component architecture and folder structure - Set up development tools (ESLint, Prettier, testing)
step.focus_areas: - Professional development environment setup - Consistent component patterns and naming conventions - Type safety with comprehensive TypeScript definitions - Performance-optimized build configuration
step.validation: React application starts successfully with TypeScript compilation and no errors

step.title: Core Chat Interface Implementation
step.actions: - Create MessageList component with scroll management - Build MessageInput with validation and keyboard handling - Implement TypingIndicator with realistic animation - Create Message components for user and assistant messages - Add markdown support for rich text in AI responses - Build conversation controls (reset, phase indicator, status)
step.focus_areas: - Smooth conversation flow with proper UX patterns - Real-time WebSocket integration for instant updates - Message styling that distinguishes user vs assistant clearly - Error handling for network issues and failed messages
step.validation: Complete chat interface supports full conversation flow with backend integration

step.title: OKR Display Panel Development
step.actions: - Create OKRDisplay component with tabbed interface - Build ObjectiveCard with quality score visualization - Implement KeyResultsList with individual score tracking - Add QualityScoreChart showing progression over time - Create ProgressIndicator for conversation phases - Build export preparation interface
step.focus_areas: - Clear visual hierarchy for OKR information - Real-time updates as conversation progresses - Quality score visualization that helps users understand improvement - Professional presentation suitable for business contexts
step.validation: OKR panel displays live updates and provides clear quality feedback throughout conversation

step.title: Export System Frontend Implementation
step.actions: - Create ExportModal with format selection interface - Implement export format generators (JSON, Markdown, PDF, text) - Build export preview functionality - Add download and share capabilities - Create export history and management interface - Implement error handling for export failures
step.focus_areas: - Professional-quality export formats suitable for business use - Intuitive export interface with clear format explanations - Reliable export process with proper error handling - Performance optimization for large OKR datasets
step.validation: Export system generates professional-quality outputs in all supported formats

step.title: Responsive Design and Layout Implementation
step.actions: - Implement responsive breakpoints for desktop and tablet - Create adaptive layout system with collapsible panels - Build mobile-friendly navigation (tab-based) - Optimize touch interactions for tablet usage - Test and refine layouts across different screen sizes - Implement responsive typography and spacing
step.focus_areas: - Seamless experience across desktop and tablet devices - Touch-friendly interactions for tablet conversations - Proper content hierarchy at different screen sizes - Performance optimization for mobile/tablet hardware
step.validation: Application provides excellent user experience on both desktop (1024px+) and tablet (768px+) devices

step.title: Accessibility Implementation and Testing
step.actions: - Implement WCAG 2.1 AA compliance features - Add proper ARIA labels and semantic HTML - Create keyboard navigation support - Implement high contrast mode - Add screen reader announcements for dynamic content - Test with accessibility tools and screen readers
step.focus_areas: - Complete keyboard accessibility for all functionality - Screen reader compatibility with meaningful announcements - Color contrast compliance and high contrast mode - Focus management for complex interactions
step.validation: Application passes WCAG 2.1 AA compliance testing and provides excellent screen reader experience

gate.name: react_application_functional
gate.criteria: - Application builds and starts without errors - TypeScript compilation successful in strict mode - All major components render without console errors - shadcn/ui components integrated properly - Responsive design works on desktop and tablet
gate.test_commands: - npm run dev (development server starts) - npm run build (production build succeeds) - npm run type-check (TypeScript validation) - npm run lint (linting passes)

gate.name: chat_interface_complete
gate.criteria: - Full conversation flow from message input to display - WebSocket connection established and maintained - Real-time message delivery with typing indicators - Proper message styling and formatting - Error handling for connection issues - Conversation phase tracking and display
gate.test_scenarios: - Send message and receive response - Connection drop and automatic recovery - Long message handling and display - Phase transitions during conversation - Error message display and recovery

gate.name: okr_display_functional
gate.criteria: - Real-time OKR updates as conversation progresses - Quality scores display with visual indicators - Individual component editing capability - Export readiness indication - Historical version tracking - Responsive layout on different screen sizes
gate.test_scenarios: - Quality score updates during conversation - Individual OKR component editing - Export button activation when ready - Panel collapse/expand on tablet - Quality score drill-down functionality

gate.name: export_system_operational
gate.criteria: - All export formats (JSON, Markdown, PDF, text) generate correctly - Export process completes in <3 seconds - Generated files are properly formatted and professional - Export modal interface is intuitive - Error handling for export failures
gate.test_cases: - Export complete OKR set in each format - Export partial OKR set (objective only) - Export failure recovery - Format preview before download - Batch export of multiple sessions

gate.name: accessibility_compliance
gate.criteria: - WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified - Complete keyboard navigation support - Screen reader compatibility tested - Color contrast ratios meet requirements - Focus management works properly - High contrast mode functional
gate.testing_tools: - axe-core automated accessibility testing - Manual keyboard navigation testing - Screen reader testing (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver) - Color contrast analysis - Focus indicator visibility testing

gate.name: performance_targets
gate.criteria: - Initial load time <3 seconds on 3G - Bundle size <500KB initial load - Core Web Vitals: LCP <2.5s, FID <100ms, CLS <0.1 - Message delivery <200ms - Export generation <3 seconds - Memory usage <100MB sustained
gate.measurement_tools: - Chrome DevTools Performance tab - Bundle analyzer for size optimization - Lighthouse for Core Web Vitals - Network throttling for 3G simulation - Memory profiling for leak detection

success_criteria.primary_success: ✅ Professional React application with shadcn/ui providing modern, polished interface ✅ Real-time chat interface enabling natural conversation flow with AI agent ✅ Live OKR display panel showing quality progression and export readiness ✅ Export system generating professional-quality outputs in multiple formats ✅ Responsive design working excellently on desktop and tablet devices ✅ WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance for inclusive user experience
success_criteria.user_experience_targets: - Conversation interface feels natural and engaging (not form-like) - Quality feedback helps users understand and improve their OKRs - Export process is intuitive with professional-quality outputs - Interface responds smoothly with no perceptible lag - Accessible to users with diverse abilities and assistive technologies - Professional appearance suitable for business contexts
success_criteria.technical_performance_targets: - Initial page load: <3 seconds on 3G connection - Message delivery: <200ms from send to display - Export generation: <3 seconds for typical OKR sets - Bundle size: <500KB initial load, <2MB total - Memory usage: <100MB sustained, <200MB peak - Error rate: <0.5% user-facing errors

handoff_to_phase_4.deliverables_required: - Complete React application with all core functionality - Real-time chat interface integrated with Phase 2 backend - OKR display panel with quality scoring visualization - Export system generating professional outputs - Responsive design working on target devices - Accessibility compliance verified and documented
handoff_to_phase_4.integration_points_for_phase_4: The frontend must support Phase 4 knowledge system integration: - Example display areas for good/bad OKR comparisons - Industry-specific template selection interface - Anti-pattern explanation and illustration - Metric suggestion display and selection - Best practice tip integration throughout conversation
handoff_to_phase_4.api_contracts_established: - WebSocket event handling for all conversation flows - REST API integration for session and OKR management - Export API integration with format selection - Error reporting and user feedback collection - Real-time quality score streaming and display

recovery_procedures.if_websocket_integration_complex: - Fall back to HTTP polling for real-time updates - Implement refresh button for manual updates - Use optimistic updates with server reconciliation - Accept longer update delays with loading indicators
recovery_procedures.if_responsive_design_challenging: - Focus on desktop experience first (1024px+ priority) - Implement basic tablet support (768px+ minimum) - Defer mobile responsive design to post-launch - Use fixed layout with horizontal scroll on small screens
recovery_procedures.if_export_system_complex: - Implement basic text and JSON export only - Use browser print functionality for PDF generation - Defer advanced formatting to future releases - Provide copy-to-clipboard as primary sharing method
recovery_procedures.rollback_criteria: - Cannot achieve basic conversation interface functionality - WebSocket integration proves fundamentally incompatible - Performance targets missed by >100% consistently - Accessibility compliance impossible within time constraints
